comandoprivado: This command can only be used in a private chat with the bot
limitestelegram: Due to Telegram's limits, we have decided to divide the menu into categories. Please press the button of the category you want to view the menu.
errorprocesarsolicitud: 𝗢𝗼𝗽𝘀! 𝗔𝗻 𝗲𝗿𝗿𝗼𝗿 𝗼𝗰𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗿𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁.
